task.title: How to Set a Reminder Notification
task.shortdesc: Here are the instructions on how to set a reminder notification in the calendar application.

prereq.p: To successfully set a reminder notification, you must know what a reminder notification is.

step.cmd: Create a new event or open an existing event for which you want to set up a reminder notification.
In the event details panel, look for the "Notification" section.
Click the drop-down menu and select the type of notification you want to use.
Choose the timing for the notification (e.g., 10 minutes, 1 hour, or 1 day before the event).
To add multiple reminders, click the "Add notification" button.
Click Save to apply the changes.

result.p: The reminder notification will be sent at the chosen time using the selected notification type.
